metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24986 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: KDE KCron through 21.12.2 uses a temporary file in /tmp when saving, butreuses the filename during an editing session. Thus, someone watching it becreated the first time could potentially intercept the file the followingtime, enabling that person to run unauthorized commands.

criterions.comment: kcron: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
